website_summaries.verdict: The complete pallet busting kit that comes with extra accessories to make the task easier.
pros: Standard pallet buster is designed to be used on general wood planks such as deck boards
Kit includes a nail pulling pry bar and leather work gloves for extra protection
cons: Can take a long time to rip apart larger pallets

customer_reviews.title: Removes boards easily!
customer_reviews.text: This tool works so well for taking apart pallets. I am able to take the pallets apart by myself, only needing to use a longer bar over the handle once in a while for the really hard to lift boards. The nails are easy to remove after the boards are off, not like using the sawzaw where you still have the nail heads to deal with. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Xcop

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but the bar is flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I picked this one out of the other pallet busters on Amazon because the two prongs on the bottom are flat instead of rounded, which helps me get between and under 2 pieces of wood that are close together. It actually works surprisingly and saved a lot of effort. The only downside to this piece compared to others is it ships in multiple sections that you have to assemble with nut and bolt tightening. Not hard to do, but during operation, that causes the bar to flex and wobble a lot more than if it were one solid bar, which makes it slightly harder to operate. Would have been 5 stars if it were 1 piece like others on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Beland

customer_reviews.title: this works!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to pallet crafts, and an extreme beginner working with wood, nails etc(other than helping my Dad as a little girl). As a petite 51 year old, I have no idea how I would have dismantled a pallet without this tool. Now it still takes a little elbow grease and sweat but this worked exactly as stated. I took apart 2 pallets in about 1 hour 15 min. No broken boards. Struggled the most getting nails out. I know I will get faster as I already figured out a few tricks. The gloves are nice but way too big for a girl. And the extra tool probably has merit but I had much better luck with a hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tool for Pallet Projects
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this tool as it makes breaking apart Pallets very easy and you preserve the boards intact. I had a pile of pallets in my garage and it took me roughly an hour to convert those to a pile of boards with which to work. It would have taken me many hours to do this same work with a hammer and crowbar and any other tool I could find to break the pallets apart and there would be many broken boards doing it that way. So, its well worth the money for this tool!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Devereux

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, easy to use, and gets the job done! But....the joints on the 3-piece pole are loose and sloppy. I'll end up reinforcing the joints, or replacing the pole with a cut section of pipe. You would probably be better off getting a similar tool with a one piece pole, or just the head, so you can cut a pipe to fit. There are several similar options on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Huge difference having the right tool.
customer_reviews.text: This tool is very clever. It protects the wood and I can pull apart a pallet in no time. Well worth the investment. I was concerned that other reviewers said the handle was too small for the tool. It is but i don't think it will cause a problem. My first thought was to make a sleeve to slip in there but I really don't think it is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely an amazing product! The first time I used it I broke down three huge pallets with only 1 board breaking (user error on my part). I’ve literally told every diy’er I know about it 😃
customer_reviews.author: Hannah G

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! Exceptional tool!
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I purchased one before from Tuffium which was crap. Now this one was PERFECT. I took a whole pallet apart in under 2 minutes both sides. The majority of the time was spent picking them up and moving to one side.I just couldn't believe how easy they lifted. Please I urge you not to waste your time and money with that yellow or blueTuffion product. Especially waiting for a refund. This one is king! Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Now I can break down pallets in about 7 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good and useful. I needed it for a DIY project at home and it let's be break down a complete pallete in about 7 minutes. Very sturdy, very well made. It comes with a pair of gloves and a crowbar. Can't beat that deal! I would definetely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Flor - Henry

customer_reviews.title: This wrecker tool works like nothing else.
customer_reviews.text: The wrecker tool made short work of pulling up my 16 foot deck. I did the first board with the pry bar and it took forever. Once that was done and I could insert the wrecker the rest was super easy. Glad I bought it and would highly recommend this tool to anyone contemplating repairing their deck.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely excellent! Great product! Beats having to use sawzall which can at times be tricky but without this tool the sawzall is the definite next fastest way. My 9 year old is ripping the pallets apart & I'm sure my 7 year old would do it to if she cared to!
customer_reviews.author: BrandyD

customer_reviews.title: Did not include gloves or bolts.
customer_reviews.text: No way to put this together, as no bolts or anything were included. Also, advertised with gloves, but it did not come with gloves.
customer_reviews.author: T. Unkelhaeuser

customer_reviews.title: Works but takes elbow grease.
customer_reviews.text: My husband can use this “easily” however I cannot use this thing at all. It’s not as easy to use as advertised and comes with a lot of brute strength while using it. It’s awkward to carry around and extremely heavy. A sawzall and a crowbar would be faster.
customer_reviews.author: Deserae

customer_reviews.title: ALL you need to get it done!
customer_reviews.text: I had 30 pallets to bust up. These items are perfect! GLOVES were ideal didn’t have any worked perfect. FLAT BAR lost mine 10 years ago didn’t know how much I needed it. PALLET BUSTER what a great tool. Heavy enough for any pallet. Felt great breaking up pallets. Only thing I would add. Old pincher pliers popped off a lot of heads of wire nails that would have made this package perfect. As it is I can only say I LOVE this product 9 STARS!!️
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Earl Wood

customer_reviews.title: Good value so far
customer_reviews.text: I use pallets to make things. I bought this as I am building a garden shed. So far this tool has saved me about 1/2 day work. I think it will hold up. The pole comes apart from the fork and I am a little suspicious about that. We will see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Szlapak

customer_reviews.title: Get's the Job Done.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the Pallet buster, The only flaw i can say with this one is that the handle is not one piece. It is actually three pieces that you put together, So when you are pulling on the handle to pry up the wood no matter how tight you screw the bolts in it still wobbles.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, does what it is supposed to....
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Still split some planks on the edges but they're the ones that appear to be cracking already. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: moehudd

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think twice!
customer_reviews.text: As a tiny woman (not even 5 feet tall) I definitely couldn’t have ripped apart 5 pallets in under 45 minutes without this thing. I would buy it again-but I don’t have to because this thing will probably last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: I like the tool except I don't understand why it doesn't fit more snugly where the handle attaches to the base. Too much play there could lead to failure with a lot of use. The tool is otherwise good and will save a lot of time taking up deck boards etal.
customer_reviews.author: Yowzerman

customer_reviews.title: handle comes in multiple pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Im sending this one back. Paid a significant amount for this pry bar only to find the handle came in multiple pieces and needed to be pieced together. Come on Stoic Tools for this price we deserve one solid piece.
customer_reviews.author: LeDugo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This came in a small box and all the pieces were there. It works exactly as intended. I selected it because it included the handle which comes in 3 pieces connected by 2 bolts and one cotter type key at the base. It was a little hard to get one bolt in due to a slight hole alignment problem. But I was able to knock it through with minimal effort. I can recommend this tool.
customer_reviews.author: FDL Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very thoughtful product from a thoughtful company!
customer_reviews.text: Love how it came with a great pair of leather work gloves complimentary! There were an extra smaller set if bolts provided should the other included was too big to fit properly! This is a sign of a thoughtful company who cares about reviews and good reviews!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: Came early and as expected!
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this pallet buster,my only hold up is the spacing between the prongs is right at too small ,more my fault for not noticing the measurement between since it is posted. Also don't forget to register,lifetime warranty is a good thing
customer_reviews.author: Jody Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Pallet Buster
customer_reviews.text: This tool is a time saver. It’s sturdy & allows me to pull up the boards on the deck up much easier & faster than with just a hammer or pry-bar. It’s well worth the money. I recommend this tool to anyone trying to dismantle deck boards or pallets.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Effective and worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: It is substantially quicker than doing it with a crowbar and hammer alone. In the time it took me to disassemble 1 pallet prior, I was now able to completely disassemble 4 and remove all the nails from them. All this with less damage to the wood. This was just my experience anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Pallet Buster Deck wrecker for my husband. He ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Pallet Buster Deck wrecker for my husband.He can now do it in a third of the time reducing so much frustration in the once time consuming task. Now he has more time to spend with his grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Disimone

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This tool is going to come in handy. It's sturdy and solid. The only small detail I would have liked to have seen, is having lock nuts and washers so they did not come loose.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not an all-you-need tool, but definitely worth the money for a reliable tool.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the extra movement between the main wrecking headpiece and the pole. I’m considering welding it together, but I’m afraid of messing it up. But that’s all, it works great. BEWARE: If the nails don’t want to budge and the runner is damaged at all, it’ll rip the runner apart, lol. But between the Deck Wrecker, a Flat Bar, and a sawzall, I don’t see why anyone would use anything else unless they had a really big bandsaw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and immediately assembled it and pulled a board out of a pallet. Wow, so easy! I had my 61 year old wife try it. No problem. Time to make an elevated pallet planter box for my sweetie!
customer_reviews.author: alan keeffe

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: A few months ago, I tore up my front deck using a pry bar. It was a miserable job. I didn't even know this deck wrecker tool existed. Ordering composite screws to start the rear deck, I saw this tool advertised and figured I'd try it. I'm amazed at the difference it made. It took maybe half the time that a pry bar would have taken, and was a lot less bad-breaking. It's sturdy and effective; it's almost fun to use. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Runner110

customer_reviews.title: Must for pallet crafters
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Took me 10 minutes to tear down a pallet! Used to take me 45 minutes but I’m not that strong. It won’t work for every pallet though. An overall must for pallet crafters!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli S.

customer_reviews.title: DESTROY ALL PALLET BASED LIFEFORMS
customer_reviews.text: "Let your plans be dark and impenetrable as night, and when you move, fall like a thunderbolt" -Sun Tzu, Art of war
customer_reviews.author: happy peeps

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: A pallet buster is a tool used to dismantle a deck. It can be done using this tool, without wrecking the deck boards, which can then be reused. It is a great tool designed to do a specific thing, and it does it very well. The icing on the cake is that included is a pair of heavy work gloves, and a pry-bar for pulling nails & spikes. Great product at a great price. Eve Allyn for Access Construction & Design
customer_reviews.author: Eve Allyn

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Woah, what can I say about this amazing tool!!! Highly recommend this product to anyone who wants to take down pallets in a breeze. Mine came looking used. It had dings and it smelled too. But, it’s such a life saver! Highly recommend. Took down pallets with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Mario E.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product, used day I got it broke down 3 pallets in like 20 min, sturdy, easy to use, assembled easily
customer_reviews.author: David Archibald

customer_reviews.title: Not the BEST but far from the WORST !!!
customer_reviews.text: Really GOOD product for the money i did however spend a little more when i bought my other one and it was alot better but for the money this definitely gets the job done for you and makes busting pallets WAY EASIER!!!!
customer_reviews.author: joe miller

customer_reviews.title: Good tool and will fit in most spaces on a pallet.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for most pallets with nails,not as much with Staples, the handle did bend near the tool so I turned it around and it bent back. Works well I would recommend. The handle could be thcker to add endurance.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas B. Deal

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it would do - rips apart pallets with the glorious power of mechanical advantage!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Rutz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: Used this tool to redo our deck which was approximately 298 square feet. We first were using a hammer and claw which was both slow and physically painful. This amazing tool came on Friday and we had the deck broken down (with the wooden planks intact) by Saturday afternoon. This tools is a lifesaver, back saver and time saver!! Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ld2017

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I used it to remove my 300 square foot deck and it worked fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Bobby baker

customer_reviews.title: A tool you never knew you needed.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Used to remove decking boards four replacement. Gives you a workout!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Libby

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool... Definitely is a time saver... Kit was missing the prybar... Only complaint... Gloves were really nice... Its a common sense tool... Good luck millennials... Like you would purchase this .... Great tool
customer_reviews.author: Traci Filon

customer_reviews.title: very heavy.
customer_reviews.text: It works as sated and is useful for a lot of other projects and lifting too, but it is very very heavy . it is very sturdy but be prepared that its not for the weak. I would recommend this to any one to take apart palates with out destroying them.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna F

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Works great and makes the job much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Bellomy

customer_reviews.title: Champ
customer_reviews.text: Wow, works like a champ. Easiest way to break apart pallets.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Works good, but you need some muscle
customer_reviews.text: Works good, however, there are some pallets that just won't come apart. It does the job on 80% of the pallets.
customer_reviews.author: pam hoskins

customer_reviews.title: PALLET BUSTER " Y E S " 😃
customer_reviews.text: It would take me over a hour to break down a pallet with a,hammer and breaker bar, and would break or split every 4th or 5th board. With this Pallet Buster I broke down a large 4x8 pallet in 15min, and didn't break a single board. After the second board came off I told my wife this Pallet Buster, paid for itself. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Great time saver for tearing pallets apart. The handle kinda sucks and goes together a little rough.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Pallet buster does the work for you.
customer_reviews.text: Love the pallet buster. Easy to use. I am recovering a lot of good wood for projects around the farm.
customer_reviews.author: Ronna

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for most uses, comes apart
customer_reviews.text: This product is so heavy, and the pry bar end is so thick, it's difficult to use effectively. Plus, it doesn't fit together securely. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R. Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use it works great made life easier during up an old deck
customer_reviews.author: V L D

customer_reviews.title: Strong material.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for breaking down pallets for hobby purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Musiclover B

customer_reviews.title: missing peices
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it came without bolts so everytime u try to use it the screws come out and u have to stop put the screws back it its annoying
customer_reviews.author: Michael Iommie

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have tool for breaking down pallets
customer_reviews.text: This tool is AWESOME!!!!! After taking close to 3 hours to break down four pallets using a hammer and pry bar, I purchased this tool. Was able to breakdown 13 pallets in less than 1 hour AND saved 95% of the boards to use for some projects. BIG thumbs up for this tool. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty! Breaking pallets down is a much easier job!
customer_reviews.author: michael.MM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap chinese
customer_reviews.text: Cheap Chinese handle is a three piece design and fit loosely and I mean loosely and out of two pallet I've broken more boards than recovered
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tool for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The tool and included gloves arrived yesterday and I immediately put it to the test. I disassembled several pallets quickly and easily. Very nice tool for the price. Wish I had one long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Billy J.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this pallet buster, but it works like a champ. The gloves are high quality also. Took down 3 pallets in about 10 minutes. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: James Welch

customer_reviews.title: Buy a sawzall
customer_reviews.text: Works ok for pine pallets but a sawzall works much better and much faster. This thing won't budge on an oak pallet and that's with using all my 240 lbs of chiseled muscle
customer_reviews.author: Joel Cvitanich

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy and if you expect it make the job a lot easier then move on to paying someone else to do it for you. One aspect of the job is a little easier but that is it and that is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Swinly

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm redoing my garage with pallet wood and I'm thrilled that this thing works as it should Its very easy to use and Not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: This gizmo is extremely helpful. Makes busting pallets easy, easy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie E.

customer_reviews.title: Handle is 3 pieces, not 1 beware!
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well compared to another pallet tool I had. My biggest complaint is that the handle is 3 pieces that bolt together. The bolt holes dont all align up perfect and I had to grind on one to get the handle to fit together correctly. I'd buy it again if the handle was one piece.
customer_reviews.author: WVdavidB

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great for pine pallets, though I bent the handle trying to take apart a heavy duty oak pallet
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Krouskop

customer_reviews.title: Well built for use and abuse
customer_reviews.text: Awsome product! Well constructed with thick metal meant to take abuse. It was nice that it came with the small prybar and gloves. Nice combo
customer_reviews.author: Jeff E.Thralls

customer_reviews.title: EASY EASY EASY
customer_reviews.text: If you’re breaking down pallets for wood projects, this tool will make the task so easy. Can’t belive I used a hammer and crowbar for so long. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This was worth the money! I can take a pallet apart in about 10 minutes with this and it leaves my wood intact. Definitely recommend if you do a lot of pallet projects.
customer_reviews.author: michelle Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product 1 yr. ago and love it. It is easy to use and the boards come off with a little effort. The pry bar makes removing nails easier than my other nail pullers. Would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Mueller

customer_reviews.title: thing showed up on time and does an amazing job.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, thing showed up on time and does an amazing job.
customer_reviews.author: Gmoney

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Forked end needs to have a taper on it. To thick to get under slats
customer_reviews.author: Bosleys Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for decks
customer_reviews.text: This tool made it so much easier to tear off deck boards, so muck quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the extra pair of gloves really come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hays

customer_reviews.title: Great invention!
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy tool for big pallets. Works great to pry them apart. It is to big for smaller pallets, though. It breaks them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Healy

customer_reviews.title: My pallet break down
customer_reviews.text: It had metal burs in the locking pin holes so slowed assembly. It did brake down two pallets in less than 15 minutes. So yes I like the product it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Eshnaur

customer_reviews.title: That it was exactly what and how they described it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son's Birthday and he loved it and kept telling me that it was perfect. So that was all I needed to know.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Recommended Tool
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm for pulling pallets apart without busting boards. Fast, easy, damn near fun. Some cracking of the wood does happen (is to be expected).
customer_reviews.author: KMoney

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great product and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it’s nice and sturdy and works great. I use it to take apart pallets I use for building projects
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Familo

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Well made easy to use highly recommend if you need to RIP apart pallets.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Taylor

customer_reviews.title: QUICK & FAST WAY TO ATTACK THOSE PALLETS....
customer_reviews.text: I love the Pallet buster is going to make taking apart these pallets so much faster to build my deck...and I'll get a workout in....lol Thanks for the great product...
customer_reviews.author: Kersondra Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift so I can't say how durable or easy to use it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best results
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Start on the ends and then the middle for easiest use. If doing more than one pallet,out two ends together to pop both at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: As described. Heavy duty material.
customer_reviews.text: Broke down pallets in about 2 minutes each and was able to save most boards to repurpose.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L Branton

customer_reviews.title: Get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what its supposed to. Easy to use good construction.

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I loved it I was able to pull a very very large 2 by 6 built deck apart in a day including all the nails.
customer_reviews.author: scott wiechman

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this tool!!! Says taking apart pallets has never been easier

customer_reviews.title: Works best with 2 people
customer_reviews.text: Tool does what it says but I would recommend two people, one to help hold the pallet down.

customer_reviews.title: I was in doubt
customer_reviews.text: Great product for pallets, coming from a real customer. No Bs

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This pallet buster is amazing!!! So easy and quick!!! No more broken boards and so much less time and effort to get pallets apart!!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for your money. As advertised. Greatly cut down the time & energy on breaking down pallets!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for breaking apart pallets. Can now break them down by myself without any extra tools or help!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease in which it removes the boards from the pallets. Well made can't ask for more

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tool makes pulling pallets apart easy. It sure beats using a hammer and pry bar!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, makes the job so much easier

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love!!! This product is amazing & so easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Received package as stated and everything was in the package, not damaged. I’m pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Jerles

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Got it at bosses request and he says he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Tollcrest Dairy

customer_reviews.title: Box was torn at corner but every piece looked fine. Will up date after Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift. Box was torn at corner but every piece looked fine. Will up date after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pallet Buster Deck Wrecker Tool - for Pallet Projects and Deck Disassembly with 3-Piece Pole and Bonus Heavy Duty Leather Work Gloves
product_meta.description:
Tired of breaking down pallets or ripping apart deckboard by hand or with a crowbar? Increase efficiency and speed up disassembly time with the Stoic Tools Pallet Buster. The complete set Includes:


-Heavy duty pallet buster with a 3-piece, extra long pole gives you the leverage needed for any demolition job

-Real cowhide leather gloves with double layered palms; just what you need to eliminate splinters, scrapes, and blisters


 Product Dimensions:
When assembled, the pallet buster is 46 inches long from end to end
Pallet Buster Fork: 7.5 inches long x 6 inches wide x 4.5 inches high. Each fork is 1.5 inches wide and the space between the forks is 2.75 inches
Pallet Buster Pole: 41.5 inches long with a diameter of 1.25 inches

Gloves: 10 inches long x 5 inches wide
feature_bullets: Stop wasting your time tearing down pallets by hand with a hammer and crowbar - Let the pallet breaker do the hard work.
